mapper.insert: insert into clazz (name,room,master_id, begin_date, end_date,subject,create_time,update_time) values (#{name},#{room}, #{masterId}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate},#{subject}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select c.*, e.name masterName from clazz c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and c.create_time between #{begin} and #{end}
order by c.update_time desc
